responsibilities: Write and test product or system development code.
Collaborate with peers and stakeholders through design and code reviews to ensure best practices amongst available technologies.
Contribute to existing documentation or educational content and adapt content based on product/program updates and user feedback.
Triage product or system issues and debug/track/resolve by analyzing the sources of issues and the impact on hardware, network, or service operations and quality.
Design and implement solutions in one or more specialized ML areas, leverage ML infrastructure, and demonstrate expertise in a chosen field.
qualifications: Proficiency in software development in one or more programming languages.
Knowledge of data structures and algorithms.
Experience in testing, maintaining, or launching software products.
Understanding of software design and architecture.
Expertise in speech/audio technology, reinforcement learning, ML infrastructure, or another ML field.
Enthusiasm for tackling new problems across the full-stack.
analysis:
The job responsibilities include writing and testing development code, collaborating with peers, contributing to documentation, triaging product issues, and designing solutions in specialized ML areas. The skills required include proficiency in programming, knowledge of data structures and algorithms, experience in software testing and maintenance, understanding of software design, and expertise in ML fields such as speech/audio technology and reinforcement learning.

While the job involves machine learning (ML) expertise, there is no explicit mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs). The focus seems to be on general ML infrastructure and specialized areas like speech/audio technology and reinforcement learning, which do not necessarily imply the use of GenAI or LLMs. Therefore, based on the provided responsibilities and skills, it is not clear that the job specifically involves working with GenAI or LLMs.
